# NSColorPicker

**Class**

An abstract superclass that implements the default color picking protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
class NSColorPicker
```

## Overview

The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorPickingDefault] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSColorPickingCustom] protocols define a way to add color pickers (custom user interfaces for color selection) to the color panel.

## Initializing the Color Picker Object

- **init(pickerMask:colorPanel:)**: Initializes the color picker with the specified color panel and color picker mode mask.

## Getting the Color Panel

- **colorPanel**: The color panel instance that owns the color picker.

## Adding Button Images

- **insertNewButtonImage(_:in:)**: Sets the image used for the specified button cell.
- **provideNewButtonImage**: The button image used by the color picker.

## Setting the Mode

- **setMode(_:)**: Overriden to set the color picker’s mode.

## Managing Color Lists

- **attachColorList(_:)**: Overriden to attach a color list to a color picker.
- **detachColorList(_:)**: Overriden to detach a color list from a color picker.

## Responding to View Changes

- **viewSizeChanged(_:)**: Overriden to respond to a size change.

## Customizing the Color Picker

- **buttonToolTip**: The tool tip that is shown when the mouse cursor is over the color picker’s button image.
- **minContentSize**: The minimum content size.

## Color Selection

- **NSColorWell**: A control that displays a color value and lets the user change that color value.
- **NSColorPickerTouchBarItem**: A bar item that provides a system-defined color picker.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSColorPickingDefault
- NSObjectProtocol
